title: What are possible research topics in renewable energy? - Quora

response.answer_text: Research that shows a path to 95% renewables that is cheaper than today’s monopoly grid energy. There are too many misconceptions about how to move from dirty energy to clean. PV solar energy for both homes and vehicles is coming very soon and the public has been misinformed by various interests with massive sunk investment. Research that explains the transition phase would be very helpful. Homes will have their own conversion from the sun’s energy and be fully off grid. The monopoly grid players will fight the loss of this control to the end. Explaining how to divest from the grid would be a good topic for these rich people.

You can talk about various types of renewable energy, or focus on the growth of renewable energy in a particular country or region. You can also discuss how renewable energy fairs better than fossil fuels. To help your research, visit PowerLinks News | Personalized Energy News. You’ll get a lot of news article and press releases that are trending to give you a better idea of what’s worth talking about. All the best!
